EXAMPLE 1ÔÉÅ

Import DLC pose-estimation data to existing project and analyze with already fitted classifiers

 1import simba
 2from simba.pose_importers.dlc_importer_csv import import_multiple_dlc_tracking_csv_file
 3from simba.outlier_tools.skip_outlier_correction import OutlierCorrectionSkipper
 4from simba.utils.cli.cli_tools import feature_extraction_runner, set_video_parameters
 5from simba.model.inference_batch import InferenceBatch
 6from simba.data_processors.agg_clf_calculator import AggregateClfCalculator
 7from simba.data_processors.movement_calculator import MovementCalculator
 8
 9# DEFINE THE PATH TO YOUR SIMBA PROJECT CONFIG INI FILE
10CONFIG_PATH = '/Users/simon/Desktop/envs/troubleshooting/DLC_2_Black_animals/project_folder/project_config.ini'
11
12# DEFINE THE PATH TO DIRECTORY CONTAINING YOUR NEW DLC CSV TRACKING FILES
13DATA_DIR = '/Users/simon/Desktop/envs/troubleshooting/DLC_2_Black_animals/CSV_DATA'
14
15# DEFINE IF / HOW YOU WANT TO INTERPOLATE MISSING POSE-ESTIMATION DATA,
16# AND IF/HOW YOU WANT TO SMOOTH THE NEW POSE ESTIMATION DATA: HERE WE DO NEITHER.
17INTERPOLATION_SETTING = 'None' # OPTIONS: 'None', Animal(s): Nearest', 'Animal(s): Linear', 'Animal(s): Quadratic','Body-parts: Nearest', 'Body-parts: Linear', 'Body-parts: Quadratic'
18SMOOTHING_SETTING = None # OPTIONS: 'Gaussian', 'Savitzky Golay'
19SMOOTHING_TIME = None # TIME IN MILLISECONDS
20
21# DEFINE THE FPS AND THE PIXELS PER MILLIMETER OF THE INCOMING DATA: HAS TO BE THE SAME FOR ALL NEW VIDEOS.
22# IF YOU HAVE VARYING FPS / PX PER MILLIMETER / RESOLUTIONS, THEN USE GUI (2023/05)
23FPS = 15
24PX_PER_MM = 4.6
25RESOLUTION = (600, 400) # WIDTH X HEIGHT
26
27
28# RUN THE DATA IMPORTER FOR A DIRECTORY OF FILES
29import_multiple_dlc_tracking_csv_file(config_path=CONFIG_PATH,
30                                        interpolation_setting=INTERPOLATION_SETTING,
31                                        smoothing_setting=SMOOTHING_SETTING,
32                                        smoothing_time=SMOOTHING_TIME,
33                                        data_dir=DATA_DIR)
34
35
36# RUN THE OUTLIER CORRECTION SKIPPER
37OutlierCorrectionSkipper(config_path=CONFIG_PATH).run()
38
39
40# SET THE VIDEO PARAMETERS FOR THE NEW VIDEOS
41set_video_parameters(config_path=CONFIG_PATH, px_per_mm=PX_PER_MM, fps=FPS, resolution=RESOLUTION)
42
43# RUN CLASSIFIERS
44InferenceBatch(config_path=CONFIG_PATH).run()
45
46
47# CLASSIFIER DESCRIPTIVE STATISTICS
48## SPECIFY WHICH AGGREGATE STATISTICS AND WHICH CLASSIFIERS
49DATA_MEASURES = [['Bout count',
50                  'Total event duration (s)',
51                  'Mean event bout duration (s)',
52                  'Median event bout duration (s)',
53                  'First event occurrence (s)',
54                  'Mean event bout interval duration (s)',
55                  'Median event bout interval duration (s)']]
56CLASSIFIERS = ['Attack']
57
58## RUN THE CLASSIFIER AGGREGATE STATISTIC CALCULATOR AND SAVE THE RESULTS TO DISK
59agg_clf_results = AggregateClfCalculator(config_path=CONFIG_PATH, data_measures=DATA_MEASURES, classifiers=CLASSIFIERS)
60agg_clf_results.run()
61agg_clf_results.save()
62
63# MOVEMENT DESCRIPTIVE STATISTICS
64## SPECIFY WHICH BODY-PARTS AND WHICH POSE-ESTIMATION CONFIDENCE THRESHOLD
65MOVEMENT_BODY_PARTS = ['Simon CENTER OF GRAVITY', 'JJ CENTER OF GRAVITY']
66MOVEMENT_THRESHOLD = 0.00
67## RUN THE MOVEMENT CALCULATOR AND SAVE THE RESULTS TO DISK
68movement_results = MovementCalculator(config_path=CONFIG_PATH, body_parts=MOVEMENT_BODY_PARTS, threshold=MOVEMENT_THRESHOLD)
69movement_results.run()
70movement_results.save()
